subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Officials from the Indy Racing League reached an agreement with leaders of the opposing Champ Car World Series to unify the two into one open-wheel racing series.
snippet: Officials from the Indy Racing League reached an agreement with leaders of the opposing Champ Car World Series to unify the two into one open-wheel racing series.
